ygData.subject: Re: Smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/11/99 7:09:59 AM Pacific Daylight Time, dave@iglou.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/11/99 7:09:59 AM Pacific Daylight Time, dave@...
writes:

<< Make skewers to get your skill up, these are good until skill 115, although
around skill 110, I was good enough at making banded that I stopped advancing
my skill and just made armor for sale. I believe after skewers you can
make skewing kits up to skill 175. >>

Yes...you will save money in the long run bringing your skill to 115 with
skewers... Then...if you want and have a little extra money...and a bit of
extra time...Sewing Kits will bring your skill to 135...to get to 175, you'll
need to make banded...the problem is, is that only banded Cloaks, Mantles and
Leggings are not trivial at 135.
